articles.title: US rejected 31% of MDH exports since Oct 2023 over salmonella: Report - Hindustan Times
articles.description: MDH and Everest spices are among the most popular in India and are also sold in Europe, Asia and North America. | Latest News India
articles.content: Amid concerns over certain products of Indian spice makers MDH and Everest, a surge has been reported in refusal rates for spice-related shipments exported by Mahashian Di Hatti (MDH) Pvt Ltd to the … [+2379 chars]
